alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 8:44AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS MOVING THROUGH SOUTH COASTAL NEW ENGLAND... At 842 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Warwick and Narragansett Bay to the coastal waters south of Rhode Island. The storms were racing to the northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and brief downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Minor street flooding is likely. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Gosnold around 845 AM EDT. Somerset and Swansea around 850 AM EDT. Fall River, Rehoboth, Dighton, Berkley and Chilmark around 855 AM EDT. Freetown around 900 AM EDT. Taunton, Oak Bluffs, Tisbury, Raynham and Lakeville around 905 AM EDT. Middleborough and Halifax around 910 AM EDT. Plymouth, Mashpee, Kingston, Carver and Plympton around 915 AM EDT. Yarmouth, Hyannis, and Duxbury around 920 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Drivers should avoid flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence
